name: Giant Leech
description: The Giant Leech is a small beast with a smooth, slimy body capable of thriving in both water and on land. It is known for its ability to latch onto prey and slowly drain their blood.
memorable: Its ability to drain life from attached prey creates a unique combat dynamic as it can both evade attacks and sap health over time.
goals: To find and attach to prey in order to drain blood.
relations: Often found in aquatic environments and may be encountered with other low-level aquatic creatures.
environment: Aquatic settings, can also be found on land due to its amphibious nature.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for effective evasion and stealth.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor physical strength make it fragile and easily damaged.
attacks: Bite attack that can attach to prey, leading to persistent blood loss.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to drain blood while attached to a target, dealing damage every turn.
senses: Possesses tremorsense out to 30 feet, enabling it to detect vibrations in water and on land.
skills: Excellent at stealth, giving it a +5 bonus, which enhances its ambush potential.
additional_information: Can detach after draining 15 hit points or if the target dies.
Requires an action from the target to detach the leech.
Average resilience due to Constitution of 10.
Minimal intelligence limits its reasoning capabilities.
Poor social abilities indicated by low Charisma score.
